body.name: Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell 3 – enhanced wifi, improved motion detection, easy installation
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 13 hrs 47 mins
features: A Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell 3 is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device.
1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC.
An upgrade from the original Ring Video Doorbell 2, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and dual-band (2.4 or 5.0 GHz) wifi connectivity.
Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in motion sensors.
Powered by the rechargeable battery pack or connects to doorbell wires for constant power.
Easily setup by connecting your Ring Video Doorbell 3 to wifi through the Ring app and mounting with the included tools.
With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 60 days, and share videos and photos.

Connect your Ring doorbell with Alexa to hear announcements on your compatible Echo device when your doorbell is pressed and see a live view of your camera if you have an Echo device with a screen. Talk to visitors by saying “Alexa, talk to the front door.”

productInformation.name: Motion Detection
productInformation.value: Advanced Motion Detection with customizable motion zones

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: Can be hardwired to an existing doorbell system or transformer for continuous charging (8-24 VAC, 40 VA max, 50/60 Hz).

productInformation.name: Setup Requirements
productInformation.value: Only if wiring in: Standard doorbell system with 8-24 VAC, 40 VA max, 50/60 Hz doorbell transformer

productInformation.name: Mounting base
productInformation.value: Integrated mounting base with adjustable angle. Can sit freestanding or mount to a wall or ceiling

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: 5.1 in. x 2.4 in. x 1.1 in. (128 mm x 62 mm x 28 mm)

productInformation.name: Box includes
productInformation.value: Ring Video Doorbell 3, rechargeable battery pack, corner mount, USB charging cable, mounting bracket, installation tools and hardware, user manual, and security sticker. Ships with a Satin Nickel faceplate.

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: 1-year limited warranty and service included. This device receives the same limited warranty as a new device. Learn more about Certified Refurbished Amazon devices.. Use of Ring Video Doorbell 3 is subject to the terms found here.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view more information on the Ring Video Doorbell 3 support page.

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about these software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

productInformation.name: Disclaimers
productInformation.value: 1Ring Alarm and all Ring Alarm accessories require a subscription for in-app features and digital notifications, including but not limited to: digital arming / disarming and integration with other Ring, Echo, Alexa, and third party products. Subscription sold separately. View Ring Protect Plans for pricing and details. Customer reviews may reference features that require a subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished, great buy, fast shipping, works great
reviews.reviewText: Camera good as new, came with wedge and used to get better coverage also used battery type and bought spare battery and usb/c charger and everything works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, but not in the arctic temperatures
reviews.reviewText: So I live in rural Alaska and I thought the device would operate fine at any temperature if it is hardwired. I was wrong. It stopped working below -5 degrees Fahrenheit even though it was hardwired and batteries had over 80% charge left. So I am using a heat pad that is constantly on and attached it on the bottom half to keep the battery/device warm. So far it works like a charm past -25 degrees Fahrenheit. Just buyer beware if you live in the arctic and you may need some other source to keep it warm. I am pleased with all of the features though and high definition quality footage even during the night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 62 year old mom loves her ring doorbell! Easy for her to work and makes her feel safe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this about a year ago and love the peace of mind it gives me as this is my first and only security camera. I have had zero problems with the refurbished camera and it has worked great. The only thing that I don't like is the battery doesn't last as long as I would like it to and defiantly requires more frequent charging in the winter. Overall would recommend buying this refurbished camera over a new one to save some money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: East to install and love the ring doorbell

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars So far, not so good
reviews.reviewText: This thing is inconsistent as all get out. Amazon can pull up directly in front of it, not 20 feet… get out and bring two large packages… and it doesn’t activate… but then someone just walking by on the sidewalk, it’ll pick up.I’m moving tomorrow… router placement and connectivity will change… So i’m going to see if that helps. If not, this is going back.My cheap $30 doorbell camera picked up activity way better than this thing.I have the ring doorbell set to maximum sensitivity and some people are able to walk right up in front of it and do the macarena without it noticing.Here’s the thing, when the Amazon guy showed up, he knocked on the door… the camera didn’t activate, but I was able to immediately pull up the live feed… so it was connected… it just didn’t acknowledge there was a person there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this!
reviews.reviewText: We had some trouble linking it to our Internet. Not because of the product, but our Internet isn’t the greatest since we moved to the country.
